it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class GameBoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.GameBoardController

  • public class GameBoardController
extends java.lang.Object
    The game board controller is the game manager, it initializes a game by generating a map and instantiating the players, it then runs the turns until the number of skulls reaches 0, after that it runs the final frenzy round and ends the game.

      getter methods for each relevant attribute
      java.util.List<PowerUpController> getPowerUpControllers() 
      java.util.List<WeaponController> getWeaponControllers() 
      Player identifyPlayer(java.lang.String name)
      get the player who has argument name
      void playFrenzyTurn()
      This method manages the final frenzy round which is played when the number of skulls on the scoreboard reaches 0 after this final round the scoreboard will be resolved and the game will end
      void playTurns()
      This method is the main game loop, it makes players do actions on their turn, replaces resources that have been picked up during a turn and resolves player deaths.
      void startGame(java.util.List<PlayerController> p)
      This method starts the game by generating a map, initializing players and starting the main game loop

      • startGame

        public void startGame(java.util.List<PlayerController> p)
        This method starts the game by generating a map, initializing players and starting the main game loop
        Parameters:
        p - the list of player controllers who will be playing the game

      • playTurns

        public void playTurns()
        This method is the main game loop, it makes players do actions on their turn, replaces resources that have been picked up during a turn and resolves player deaths.

      • playFrenzyTurn

        public void playFrenzyTurn()
        This method manages the final frenzy round which is played when the number of skulls on the scoreboard reaches 0 after this final round the scoreboard will be resolved and the game will end
